summary: The diff implements all 8 requirements from the BuildRequest. Frontend changes include validation for classLevel (11th/12th), subject (Physics/Chemistry/Maths), and chapter fields in Admin.tsx, with form submission blocking and error messages. The image-only workflow is preserved by keeping questionText and option fields optional. Backend deleteQuestion in main.mo properly handles Nat ID matching and returns Bool. QuestionGallery.tsx implements delete functionality with success/error messages and automatic refresh via React Query cache invalidation.

hallucinated_features.description: Question image field made required in Admin.tsx validation
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-85 states that images can be used without text, implying images remain optional. The BuildRequest does not require making question images mandatory, yet the validateForm function in Admin.tsx includes if (!questionImage) { errors.general = "Question image is required"; }, forcing image uploads.

hallucinated_features.description: Removed questionText and option text fields entirely from the form
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-85 requires preserving these fields as optional, not removing them. The diff shows only classLevel, subject, chapter, questionImage, correctAnswer, and marks fields remain in the form state and UI, but questionText and option A/B/C/D text fields appear to be completely removed rather than kept as optional fields.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed Question type structure in backend to remove questionText and option fields
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend Question type in main.mo shows only questionImage without questionText or option text fields. REQ-85 requires preserving the existing image-only workflow where these fields remain optional, not removing them from the data model entirely.
